reviews.review_content:
this guy is a big asshole. he make so many issues while submitting assignments. many stupid excuses. and he try to be bigger than the professor. no one should take cloud computing if this is the ta. he only create problems for all teams. when you ask for help he act like he knows everything and all assignments are silly but he cant even read code or look reference up. Prof sahu is a good teacher trying to make a good course but he made biggest mistake to take this TA
Workload:
not too difficult. very managable. would be even more meaningful and better if this ta was replaced.
